imageFromPageImage.fieldDescription: Use the featured image defined in the properties of the linked page, or in the properties of the current page when no link is defined.
imageFromPageImage.name: ./imageFromPageImage

alt.fieldDescription: Textual alternative of the meaning or function of the image, for visually impaired readers.
alt.name: ./alt

altValueFromPageImage.fieldDescription: Use the description defined on the referenced asset, or the alternative text defined in the page properties.
altValueFromPageImage.name: ./altValueFromPageImage

altValueFromDAM.fieldDescription: When checked, populate the image's alt attribute with the value of the dc:description metadata in DAM.
altValueFromDAM.name: ./altValueFromDAM

decorative.fieldDescription: If the image is mostly decorative and doesn't convey additional meaning to a visitor, then it might be acceptable to not provide an alternative text, which will make the image ignored by assistive technology like screen readers.
decorative.name: ./isDecorative

presettype.fieldDescription: Select either an Image Preset or Smart Crop rendition.
presettype.name: ./dmPresetType

imagepreset.fieldDescription: Image Preset to use when rendering image.
imagepreset.name: ./imagePreset

smartcroprenditions.fieldDescription: Select Auto for Dynamic Media to decide the best rendition. Else select a specific smart crop rendition.
smartcroprenditions.name: ./smartCropRendition

imageModifiers.fieldDescription: Additional Dynamic Media Image Serving commands separated by '&'.Field gives complete flexibility to change image effects.
imageModifiers.name: ./imageModifiers

disableLazyLoading.fieldDescription: When checked, image will be loaded eagerly, regardless of if the image is currently visible by the user.
disableLazyLoading.name: ./disableLazyLoading

multicomposite.fieldLabel: composite enter text what you want
